convertible.translation[0].definitions[0: an object that is convertible can be folded or arranged in a different way so that it can be used as something else
convertible.translation[0].definitions[1: able to be exchanged for the money of another country
convertible.translation[0].definitions[2: a financial document such as an insurance arrangement or a bond that is convertible can be exchanged for money, stocks etc
convertible.translation[1].definitions[0: a car with a soft roof that you can fold back or remove
convertible.translation[2].definitions[0: able to be changed from one thing to another
The new preferred shares will be convertible immediately to common shares.
